name: When Nightmares Come True
description:
Sometimes nightmares can become really close...

This game pretends to horror you using only cubes and no textures as restriction. Will i be able of scaring you?

I didn't make music or sounds effects. Author Explanation: If I'm able to scare you using only cubes graphics, I will learn a lot about this experience and it will let me to make scarier games  with all their potential. UPDATE: I'm learning a lot thanks to people feedback. This short game was made in hurry because I hadn't time enough. I promise that next one will be totally different and will break your minds! Thanks again for all feedback and gameplays, you are helping me a lot! :)
